details.title: 1. Mathematical Foundations
details.content: Focus on problem-solving with real-world scenarios and common interview questions related to statistics, probability, and linear algebra. Outcome: Ability to solve complex mathematical problems and explain your reasoning, a common interview requirement.

details.title: 2. Basic Data Analysis & Case Studies
details.content: Incorporate case studies and typical data analysis interview questions from top companies. Outcome: Proficiency in explaining and executing data analysis tasks, critical for technical interviews.

details.title: 3. Introduction to Databases & SQL Challenges
details.content: Intensive practice with SQL through common interview questions and scenarios. Outcome: Ability to solve complex SQL queries and database design questions, often asked in interviews.

title: Stage 2: Intermediate Skills, Specializations & Coding Interviews

details.title: 4. Advanced Data Analysis & Interview Simulations
details.content: Focus on scenarios and questions commonly presented in interviews, including machine learning model evaluation and data interpretation. Outcome: Confidence in tackling advanced data analysis questions, a staple in many technical interviews.

details.title: 5. Bayesian Inference & Case-Based Learning
details.content: Emphasis on real-world applications and typical interview questions regarding Bayesian methods. Outcome: Ability to articulate and apply Bayesian methods in various scenarios, a valuable skill in interviews.

title: Stage 3: Advanced Techniques, Emerging Technologies & System Design

details.title: 7. Big Data Technologies & Scenario-Based Learning
details.content: Gain hands-on experience with big data scenarios and delve into interview-style questions on big data tools and architectures. Learn to navigate and implement solutions using technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, and real-time data processing platforms.

details.title: 8. NLP & AI in Practice
details.content: Explore practical applications of Natural Language Processing and Artificial Intelligence. Understand the underlying mechanisms of text analysis, sentiment analysis, chatbots, and more, while also discussing the ethical considerations in AI.

details.title: 9. Deep Learning & Neural Networks with Practical Challenges
details.content: Dive into the world of deep learning and neural networks. Understand the architecture and functionality of CNNs, RNNs, and GANs. Tackle practical challenges and learn how to apply these models to real-world datasets.

details.title: 10. Reinforcement Learning & Strategic Thinking
details.content: Understand the principles of reinforcement learning and its applications in strategic decision-making. Learn about various algorithms and how they can be used to solve complex, dynamic problems.

courses.title: Case Studies in Strategic Decision Making

details.title: 11. Advanced AI Topics & Ethical Considerations
details.content: Explore advanced topics in AI including transformative algorithms, innovative applications, and the future landscape. Discuss the ethical implications and responsibilities of deploying AI in various sectors.

details.title: 12. System Design & Architecture
details.content: Learn to design robust, scalable systems. Understand the principles of good system design, from database architecture to distributed systems. Tackle common interview questions and scenarios to demonstrate your ability to design and critique complex systems.

details.title: 13. Capstone Project with Interview Focus
details.content: Engage in a comprehensive capstone project that simulates a real-world problem often presented in big company interviews. Apply the skills and knowledge acquired throughout the course to devise solutions, demonstrating your ability to tackle complex problems from start to finish.
